root.name: Sorcerer's Kingdom
root.description: Critical ReceptionElectronic Gaming Monthly's Mike Weigand gave this game a one paragraph review that doesn't indicate much about it's content. In giving the game a score of 7 out of 10 he wrote, "There a basically two types of people for this kind of game: those who love them and those who hate them. If you are in the former, then you will probably love Sorcerer's Kingdom. Plenty of game play awaits the gamer here, so clear the calendar and dive right in".
